thread.section_title: News from today and last hour | ФАКТИ.БГ
thread.title: Heating and hot water supply cut off in parts of four Sofia districts
thread.title_full: Heating and hot water supply cut off in parts of four Sofia districts

author: СУ Св. Климент Охридски
title: Heating and hot water supply cut off in parts of four Sofia districts
text:
Parts of the Sofia districts "Mladost" 4, "Nadezhda" 1, "Geo Milev", and "Dianabad" are left without heating and hot water, announced on their website by "Toplofikatsiya Sofia" in the "Accidents and repairs" section, BTA reported.
Those living in block 447 of "Mladost" 4, in the area of 16th Primary School "R. Zhinzifov", 3rd Secondary School "V. Kolarov" in „Nadezhda“ 1, on ul."Kosta Lulchev" №15, №17, №19, ul."Ann. Von Humboldt" №30, №32, ul."Lidice" №4, №6 in „Geo Milev“ and in bl.14, bl.15, bl.16, bl.17 in „Dianabad“.
It is expected that in „Nadezhda“ 1 the heating will be restored tomorrow at 17:00, and in the remaining neighborhoods – on January 4.
